about_the_game:
Lost your mind stamping a stool? Failed to understand the manual? Had to move back to your parents after these setbacks?

Not anymore! IKEV is a simulator kindly designed to prepare you for the challenges of moving into your new home. Step into the "Training Void", a virtual space where your modern apartment awaits, and encounter various tasks that mimic real-life moving scenarios. From dealing with incomplete orders to having no manuals, every aspect of the moving process is meticulously recreated to provide an immersive learning experience!

Your assigned audio assistant will be your trusty guide throughout the simulation. Whether you need advice on organizing your belongings or assistance with troubleshooting definitely not purposefully created problems, your assistant is there to provide advice, encouragement, and even the occasional dose of... tough love?

Ready to master the art of moving? Prepare yourself for the ultimate test in IKEV!

Features


  • Four fully interactable furniture pieces to build 🤩
  • Zero manuals to follow 🤑
  • Hidden extra hard puzzles to solve 🤯
  • Learning fake Norwegian to understand what you have to build 🇳🇴
  • A cute voice assistant!! 💁‍♀️

highlighted.name: Nah I'mma do my own thing
Every man should build a tree...

name: IKEV

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 2200GE or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / Radeon R9 390X or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Rift S, Oculus Rift CV1, Valve Index, HTC Vive 1, HTC Vive Pro, HTC Vive Pro 2, HTC Vive XR Elite, Pico 4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Rift S, Oculus Rift CV1

short_description: IKEV is a furniture assembling simulator in VR where the main antagonist is a lack of manuals! Be creative and resourceful, work through the incorrectly delivered orders, and stay diligent in furnishing your apartment.
